item.title: ‘Final Destination 7’ in the Works; ‘Bloodlines’ Co-Writer Returning
item.description: A seventh “Final Destination” movie is in the works at New Line with “Bloodlines” co-writer Lori Evans Taylor returning to pen the new installment. Craig Perry, Sheila Hanahan

item.title: New ‘Final Destination’ Movie in the Works with ‘Bloodlines’ Co-Writer (Exclusive)
item.description: Death is bloody good business for New Line.
